short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summize brings the business closer together by connecting the digital data threads across all your contract processes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summize's Chrome extension allows users to connect their contract processes seamlessly with Gmail. Bringing vital CLM features straight into the inbox, Summize empowers the whole business to connect the dots on the contract lifecycle.
‍
Even non-legal users can request contracts directly in Gmail and initiate requests based on attachments and content pulled straight into Summize from their emails! Say goodbye to searching through email chains and dealing with rogue requests. Instead, users can submit to legal in just a few clicks for an embedded, intuitive experience that works where users do.
‍
Built-in workflows also allow access to legal-approved playbooks, clauses, and templates, minimising legal intervention while maintaining compliance.
This unique approach removes friction and frustration for the business, with huge time and efficiency gains for legal!
